items.content_html: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers
items.title: avoidwork/woodland: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers

items.content_html: @stexcore/encrypted-middleware is a lightweight and flexible Express.js middleware designed to handle encrypted HTTP requests. Seamlessly integrated with encrypted-fetch, this middleware supports hybrid encryption (RSA + AES), allowing secure transmission and decryption of sensitive data.
items.title: stexcore/encrypted-middleware: @stexcore/encrypted-middleware is a lightweight and flexible Express.js middleware designed to handle encrypted HTTP requests. Seamlessly integrated with encrypted-fetch, this middleware supports hybrid encryption (RSA + AES), allowing secure transmission and decryption of sensitive data.

items.content_html: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.
items.title: nktnet1/rt-stack: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.

items.content_html: encrypted-fetch is a lightweight HTTP client that ensures secure communication by encrypting headers, body, and paths. Designed for compatibility with @stexcore/encrypted-middleware, this library leverages hybrid encryption (RSA + AES) to seamlessly transmit encrypted data to servers using the middleware for decryption.
items.title: stexcore/encrypted-fetch: encrypted-fetch is a lightweight HTTP client that ensures secure communication by encrypting headers, body, and paths. Designed for compatibility with @stexcore/encrypted-middleware, this library leverages hybrid encryption (RSA + AES) to seamlessly transmit encrypted data to servers using the middleware for decryption.

items.content_html: A lightweight package for searching images and YouTube videos. Provides simple Typescript APIs to search for images using Google Images and videos using YouTube's search API.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
